title: Central Square Conveniences
name: Central Square Conveniences
description:
A Map by Rekha6

Welcome students and other newcomers!  These are the places I find useful in my daily life in Central Square, Cambridge, MA.

properties.name: 1369 Coffee House
properties.description: Posted by Bratfarrar 757 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA1369 is one of the great independent coffee houses in Cambridge. The staff pretty much all have extreme body art (tattoos, piercings, etc.), the music is at the right volume (although is fairly out there - industrial, post-goth, punk, who knows?), and of course the coffee is delicious. Being close to MIT, they also have long power strips going down each wall. Wifi used to be free, but now they charge (the place can get pretty busy)
